definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: He showed up, however, in a stolen Lexus SUV.
sentences.chinese: 但是他竟然开着一辆偷来的雷克萨斯去接受审判。

sentences.english: Goodfellas, Lexus coupe, there are now free to buy.
sentences.chinese: 好家伙，雷克萨斯轿跑车，现在有钱买闲地。

sentences.english: Templin says Lexus will be offering no cars smaller than ones it already sells.
sentences.chinese: 坦普林称，雷克萨斯不会推出比现有车型更小的车型。

sentences.english: The Equus will try to go up against the Mercedes S-class and the Lexus LS.
sentences.chinese: 雅科仕将尝试与奔驰S级和雷克萨斯LS分庭抗礼。

sentences.english: But can Lexus actually take the fight to exotic cars?
sentences.chinese: 但是，雷克萨斯真的能和欧美品牌对抗吗？

sentences.english: Toyota, for example, produces in Japan the bulk of its Prius hybrid cars and Lexus luxury range.
sentences.chinese: 比如丰田的普莱斯混合动力和雷克萨斯车款。

sentences.english: Both Lexus and Acura were started as premium brands in the US.
sentences.chinese: 雷克萨斯和讴歌作为高档品牌首先登陆美国市场。

definition: Mazda, Japanese car make (derived from name Matsuda 松田)/also known as 萬事得|万事得
Toyota or Toyoda (name)/Toyota, Japanese car make
Škoda, Czech Republic car manufacturer, a subsidiary of Volkswagen Group
